message: The SOURCE_TYPE field for indicator 12-8-1, translated into en
data: Responses to the quadrennial reporting by UNESCO Member States on the implementation of the 1974 Recommendation concerning Education for International Understanding, Co-operation and Peace and Education relating to Human Rights and Fundamental Freedoms. The most recent round of reporting took place in 2020-21. The results were published in the Global SDG Indicator Database in July and September 2021. (See methodology section for details of questions asked).
